All of my loafers are a 10. I wear size 10.5 and 11 sneaker. Loafers tend to run big and don't have half sizes so I usually go with the 10 because the 11 feels too long with no socks. Shoes look great. Great color and quality. GREAT price point also. If you are on the fence I can definitely say these are worth it.

评论概述: Luxury Velvet Loafers at a fraction of the luxury price!
评论详情: MHB Store's Men's Luxury Velvet Loafers are an amazing combination of comfort and style, in a wide number of colors! The velvet upper is soft and luxurious, with glitter gold detailing and a big cat shaped designer golden ornament; the color of the velvet is such a rich and subtle green, like a hunter green. The stable gold rivets and matching but unique anti-kick band around the toe area ensure durability and the removable insole provides added comfort. The pointed-toe slip-on design adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. These shoes are perfect for any fashion-forward man looking to elevate his style, or needs a good pair of slick shoes for a function or event!  10/10 The velvet green color is a rich forest hue that is sure to turn heads.

评论概述: They didn't fit me but my friend loves them
评论详情: These shoes are velvet delicious and decadent in style. I was bummed they were a bit big, but I am a lady and men's shoe sizes sort of fluctuate for women's sizes. My very dapper friend however was quite pleased to find they fit him like a glove. Easy and comfortable out of the box, the sole is exquisitely just for clean hardwood floors and the interior is just as pretty as the exterior. Highly recommend it for a bit of posh luxury.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress Shoes with Attention to Detail
评论详情: These dress shoes are absolutely stunning…I got these for my husband and he loves them. The bottoms even have gold plated and textured feel to them. The design and attention to detail is tremendous. The fit is as expected…perfect! Overall, I highly recommend them!

评论概述: Super fancy to the point of being impractical for almost anything....  Nice looking, very fancy.
评论详情: OMG, GOLD, super green fancy gold all over the green crushed velvet.  The bottom is gold, there are gold dots everywhere, there is gold on the inside, gold gold gold.  Super fancy.  They are mostly comfortable, but I think the point is that these are so fancy that wearing them would likely damage them.  I only walked a few steps in them then decided to save them for the next super fancy event.  Wow these are stunning, but I don't feel they will stay that way with normal usage, something best to be saved for when you have an event.

评论概述: Elegancia and luxury go hand to hand
评论详情: This is my preferred pair of shoes. The package contains a drawstring bag for each shoe, intended to safeguard the suede material. I have donned them on four distinct formal occasions and they have generated significant interest and admiration, garnering attention from both adults and children alike. Many individuals have inquired as to their source of purchase. They are particularly well-suited for a tuxedo ensemble, as opposed to a regular suit. These shoes are reasonably priced and offer superior quality.
These fit true to size and are very comfortable. I have worn them to a wedding and to a photoshoot and both times I have had no issues with them.

I got these for my husband. He is very much a “classic man”. He has a very old fashioned office that is classy. He also smokes a tobacco pipe and often  (somewhat) jokes that he needs a smoking jacket and shoes. Welp, when I saw these - I knew they’d be perfect for his “smoking” and office shoes. They color is gorgeous - deep emerald green with pops of gold. They really are snazzy! However, I did size up after reading some of the reviews. He has wider feet. So, while the size up accommodated the width of his feet - they run narrow and long. So the length ended up being a bit too long. He can still wear them but they aren’t snug as he’d like. But he loves them nonetheless.

评论概述: Nice suede finish but could be better on fit and charm quality.
评论详情: The suede material gives the shoes a soft and luxurious feel.  Definitely, the stud details all over the shoe is a nice touch, giving the loafers an added element of style and sophistication that's perfect for special occasions or even everyday wear. I didn’t care much for the charm’s finish. It didn’t make justice for the overall quality of the shoe. Also, the fit was very snugged on the front of shoe and a bit loose on the back.  You can easily dress them up with a suit or dress them down with a pair of jeans for a more casual look.  The slip-on design makes them easy to put on and take off, and the rubber sole provides good traction, ensuring that you stay steady on your feet even on slippery surfaces.  Overall, this loafers are a good investment for anyone looking for a pair of shoes that are both stylish and comfortable. They're perfect for special occasions and versatile enough to wear on a daily basis.

评论概述: super cool shoes, way too big
评论详情: These shoes are so fun, and I'm super sad that they're too big. I got them for myself (a woman) so I took my shoe size, subtracted two and ordered! If you look at the last picture, they basically say that the US sizes are arbitrary and you need to measure your foot. I didn't read that before ordering and I wish I would have. They're way to big to wear and they're soooo cool looking, The velvet is a rich green, the studs are metal and seem to be well attached and the sole of the shoe is shiny gold! I'm sure it's going to be slick on any sort of wet/icy surface, but I don't care. Also, it won't matter because they're too big even with thick socks (which ruin the vibe anyway).

I recently got these Velvet shoes and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. These shoes are not only stylish and fashionable but also comfortable to wear. The pointed-toe design and suede material give the shoes a classy and elegant look that can be worn for any formal or semi-formal occasion. The added rivets on the shoes give them a unique touch that sets them apart from other loafers. One of the best things about these shoes is how lightweight they are. This makes them ideal for wearing for extended periods of time without experiencing any discomfort or pain. The slip-on design also makes them convenient to put on and take off, and the velvet material adds an extra level of luxury and sophistication.
These look like really expensive lazy shoes! They fit perfect and looks great with jeans or suit! Nice!

These velvet loafers are amazing, good color combination, and complement each other. They are perfect party wear. Look stylish, I liked the golden accent on these shoes, gives them a luxurious feeling. They fit very well. East to wear and comfortable. It has a nonslip rubber sole for a good grip. My Spouse liked them a lot, would recommend them.

This shoe is much more beautiful in person, it’s comfortable and true to size. It made a remarkable gift. The sole is gold coated which is unique and the interior lining is red. The exterior is velvet with gold embellishments

评论概述: These "Jump the Shark", but careful with sizing
评论详情: As soon as these arrived, my wife came to me and said, "you really jumped the shark with that purchase!"  And yes, these shoes are just as advertised, including sparkles all over and "designer golden ornament."  She's now calling me Hef.  (If you don't know who that is, look it up.)Sizing's an issue as the website says normal sizing and if you have a wide foot, go a size larger, but the images have you do your own measurement.  I made the mistake of measuring per their guidelines and then, with a wide foot, going a little larger.  So, my normal shoe is a 9 - 9.5, their measurement put me between 10 and 10.5, and I went with the 10.5.  But I should have gotten the 10.  So, make of that what you will.  (As a product tester, unfortunately I can't just return them for the right size.)My size issue notwithstanding, these have started out comfortable to wear - I would say right-out-of-the-box, but they don't come in a box, they're just in a plastic bag ("caution, don't suffocate the baby").  And as per the website, these also definitely come with the smell of burnt plastic or something, so as they suggest, let 'em air out a bit before you stash in an enclosed closet with your finest linens and silks.  I can only imagine as to longevity they'll be like a few other tuxedo shoes I've owned and depreciate quickly after a few fun parties.You can't take yourself too seriously and wear these around, and they're definitely going to get comments of all kinds.  I actually got them because I frequently speak at conferences about things like new technology and the space economy, so I thought these would be great fun to add a little lightness to these events.  With the little gold rivets, they're space shoes to be sure!If these shoes are what you're after, they're definitely what you're going to get!

So, I’m not too pleased with the packaging because these shoes are stunning and would make a great gift. I think the packaging should match the elegant design of the shoe. It really is, however, a gorgeous site. I love the velvety finish and design. The green and gold really goes well together. They fit nice as well.

Hey there, folks! It's Mike P. here, and I just had to share my thoughts on the MHB Men's Luxury Velvet Loafers. Let me tell you, these shoes are a real game-changer when it comes to style and comfort.  First off, the velvet material is top-notch. It gives the shoes a sleek and sophisticated look that's perfect for any formal occasion. And the suede accents? They add just the right amount of texture to make these loafers stand out from the rest.  Now, let's talk about comfort. The slip-on design makes these shoes super easy to wear, and the pointed-toe design adds just the right amount of flair without sacrificing comfort. Plus, the cushioned insole provides support for all-day wear, making these loafers perfect for those long days on your feet.  But what really sets these shoes apart from the rest are the rivet details. They give the loafers a bit of edge and personality, which is exactly what I look for in a shoe. I've received so many compliments on these shoes already, and I can't wait to wear them out again.  Overall, I highly recommend the MHB Men's Luxury Velvet Loafers to anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable shoe for any occasion. These shoes are a must-have in any fashion-forward man's wardrobe. So go ahead and treat yourself, you won't regret it!

I saw these and just had to have them.  They look like a really cool "opera slipper".  They actually fit pretty well - i have a wide foot and these feel pretty good.  The heel is very grippy which is good. They are reasonably flexible and look just so neat!  I really like them.  I got the blue and the gold embellishments really stand out without being overdone if that makes sense

Fun color shoe with gold dots makes these a dressy yet playful addition to the wardrobe. They are narrow but fit well - I ignored the foot measurement chart and just ordered my regular size. They look good but not as 'velvety' as I expected Some missed stitching along the edge left about 1/4 inch unfinished on one of the shoes, but the other was fine. It's not very noticeable (except for the loose thread) but we'll see just how long these hold up.

These shoes are the perfect dress shoe. The material is super soft and the gold dots give them a touch of class without being too much. They fit true to size and look like very expensive shoes. These would be great for anything from a nice dinner, to prom, to wedding attire. The versatility makes them a perfect closet staple for any man's closet. The fact that they come in different colors makes them work for even more events and styles. I highly recommend them!

As instructed and warned, size should be chosen by your foot measurement and not by your usual size as it was stated "Please choose size by your foot length, the size you can choose from the size charts is not really US size is only according to our size table". Big mistake! According to my foot measurement, I ordered an 8 1/2 (usually order 9 1/2). Guess what? Too small! The shoe also runs a bit narrow. Need to return. If you are going to purchase this, my recommendation is to order your regular size and forget the size table......and, if your foot is wide, this shoe may not be for you
